findings.title: Inadequate Invariant Enforcement
findings.description: The code does not properly state how invariants are enforced.
findings.location: Arithmetic operations, computation of swapping values

findings.title: Lack of Fuzzer Testing
findings.description: Missing use of a fuzzer or similar automated testing method to increase confidence in arithmetic operations.
findings.location: Arithmetic operations, computation of swapping values

findings.title: Lack of Incident Response Plan
findings.description: No incident response plan describing how the protocol's actors must react in case of failure.

findings.title: Inadequate Documentation for Users
findings.description: Missing documentation for users to safely integrate their smart contracts with SmarDex, potentially leading to security issues.

findings.title: Incomplete Code Review
findings.description: Inline documentation is not enough for a full review of the code; expansion is needed.

findings.title: Lack of Integration Guidelines
findings.description: Missing documentation for integrating swapping pairs directly into third-party smart contracts, potentially leading to transaction ordering risks.

findings.title: Incomplete Testing Coverage
findings.description: Unit tests do not cover certain corner cases; code reverts unexpectedly.

findings.title: Lack of Fuzz Testing
findings.description: Missing fuzz tests to ensure users cannot cheat or misuse the price computation during mints, burns, or swaps.
